name: a last conversation with my cat
name_original: a last conversation with my cat
description:
It’s Christmas Day and Nasima’s apartment building is burning down. Instead of seeking refuge out in the snowfall, Nasima races up the stairs without a second thought. Risking her life is an easy choice, for her beloved cat is trapped inside the apartment. Yet once Nasima finds him, there's a new problem. He doesn’t want to come out, and Nasima will not leave without him…

Created by:

Story and Writing: AmiraHasna

Character Art: Asynla

Background Art: AmiraHasna  + Dusk + Jobathon

Music: KillToe

Programming: gogoIEO

Special thanks for snowfall GUI: BáiYù

Notes:

To make the VN fullscreen, go to Preferences in Main Menu and select "Fullscreen"
